#SummerSafetyTips B careful wht u say on ur ansring machine. Callrs dnt need 2 knw tht ure not home. Only tht u cant take d call rght now
#SummerSafetyTips On vacations, either stop newspaper delivery, or hav a frnd/neighbor pick it up. Piled up papers r sure sign tht u r away.
#SummerSafetyTips  Refrain frm posting ur vacation pics on FB/Twt. Ur itinerary or travel pics may help a burglar target ur unattended home.
#SummerSafetyTips  On vacations, while going to Airport/Rly. Station in a Cab, dont share any travel info. with or in front of the driver.
